author: jfclere

author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1135 - NetUI deadlock condition for concurrent requests to an action and a JSP with a JSP include.

From within the PageFlowPageFilter, we now place an attribute on the request that lets us determine if a page is already set to commit any session-scoped changes for a given page flow module, with the storage handler. Then if the page includes another JSP associated to the page flow, it will not try to commit changes. This will ensure we don't get locks out of order. We only do this if the request is not a forward from the PageFlowRequestProcessor.
